forkee.name: lodash
forkee.description: A JavaScript utility library delivering consistency, modularity, performance, & extras.

issue.title: `throttled.cancel()` doesn't clear the timeout and cached value

comment.body: @megawac Thanks for fixing it so fast, you are awesome ;)

pull_request.title: feat: expose LodashWrapper
pull_request.body:
This PR exposes `LodashWrapper` on the `lodash` function. 
It also alters how methods return intermediate LodashWrappers that allows chaining with a user defined subclass of `LodashWrapper`

related to #866
